casebody.data:
Kimberly Ann HUERTA and Annemarie Pascual as co-personal representatives of the Estate of Stephen Musolino and co-trustees of the Stephen Musolino Trust, Sycamore Marble Co., Inc. and Mediterranean Exports, Inc., Appellants,
v.
David LUCE, an individual, and Blue Devil Investments Inc., a foreign corporation, Appellees. No. 3D17-1264 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed May 2, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
